text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) affaan-m/everything-claude-code | 98% | stars now 31520 → est 64326 (range 64229-64423)
   https://github.com/affaan-m/everything-claude-code
2) different-ai/openwork | 95% | stars now 7558 → est 13007 (range 12957-13057)
   https://github.com/different-ai/openwork
3) github/copilot-sdk | 94% | stars now 5854 → est 10041 (range 9996-10086)
   https://github.com/github/copilot-sdk
4) coreyhaines31/marketingskills | 94% | stars now 4883 → est 8923 (range 8885-8961)
   https://github.com/coreyhaines31/marketingskills
5) sickn33/antigravity-awesome-skills | 94% | stars now 4039 → est 7093 (range 7061-7125)
   https://github.com/sickn33/antigravity-awesome-skills

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
